scripts.clean-project: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf ./apps/app/node_modules && rm -rf ./packages/components/node_modules && rm -rf ./packages/modules/node_modules && rm -rf ./packages/utils/node_modules
scripts.app:start: cd apps/app && DARK_MODE=media EXPO_USE_METRO_WORKSPACE_ROOT=1 npx expo start -c
scripts.app:web: cd apps/app && DARK_MODE=class EXPO_USE_METRO_WORKSPACE_ROOT=1  npx expo start --web
scripts.app:ios: cd apps/app && ruby -v && DARK_MODE=media EXPO_USE_METRO_WORKSPACE_ROOT=1  npx expo start --ios -c
scripts.app:android: cd apps/app && pwd && ruby -v && DARK_MODE=media EXPO_USE_METRO_WORKSPACE_ROOT=1  npx expo start --android
scripts.app:android-dev-build: cd apps/app && DARK_MODE=media npx expo run:android
scripts.app:ios-dev-build: cd apps/app && ruby -v && DARK_MODE=media npx expo run:ios
scripts.app:storybook-ios: cd apps/app && DARK_MODE=media EXPO_USE_METRO_WORKSPACE_ROOT=1 cross-env STORYBOOK_ENABLED='true'  npx expo start --ios
scripts.app:storybook-android: cd apps/app && DARK_MODE=media EXPO_USE_METRO_WORKSPACE_ROOT=1 cross-env STORYBOOK_ENABLED='true'  npx expo start --android
scripts.web:pre-build: cd node_modules && rm -rf @gluestack-ui && cd .. && cp -r packages/@gluestack-ui node_modules/@gluestack-ui
scripts.web:docker-publish: docker tag talkify:latest ghcr.io/a1exsun/talkify:0.0.2 && docker push ghcr.io/a1exsun/talkify:0.0.2
scripts.lint: cd apps/web && npm run lint && cd ../app && npm run lint
scripts.format: cd apps/web && npx prettier --write "{,!(node_modules)/**/}*.{tsx,ts,js,jsx}" && cd ../app && npx prettier --write "{,!(node_modules)/**/}*.{tsx,ts,js,jsx}"
